name: Gordig's Great Machine
description:
You've finally arrived at the gates of the Great Machine! In a quest to find your identity, you have to complete challenges to reach the final chamber to ask a single question, "What is my name?".

Controls

Arrow Keys- Up, Down, Left, Right 

R- Resets the level

Additional Info

This game has been  made with Unity. This was our first gamejam/codejam and is our first complete project.

Credits

TheBoredProgrammer64

DysonSphere

Menu Artwork by tutasmaster
